Great package, for me...TYVM.

Easy install, planes work fine with the exception of sound. Engine sounds are there for a short time, then disappear after a moment or two. I can still hear ambient sounds from the cockpit.

Anybody have any ideas to help me with the engine sounds? 

Thanx uploader.

I found a fix for engine sounds disappearing.

I used a third party aircraft sound addon, and applied sounds from a A321 to all the aircraft in this package. Sounds awesome and seems stable.

I used Flight 1's Audio environment - "Airliner edition". 

There is also a patch (178mb) for this package but I haven't tried to apply it yet. By the way, I have FSX/deluxe/with serv pack 2 applied/Vista32.

There is a patch for this airplane package.

Any way to get the serial? (needed to install)
